casebody.data:
BROWN
v.
KROGER CO., et al. No. 257A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 3, 2005. Faith Herndon, for Vonda Kay Brown.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of June 2005 by Defendants to Hold the Notice of Appeal in Abeyance:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of June 2005."
